backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles, access control, single-owner admin logic, and profile CRUD with role syncing.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new structure by adding owner and Telegram config fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/docs/change-request-intake.md: Template for submitting and approving detailed UI/feature change requests before implementation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style configuration defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and setting site metadata.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation detailing technology stack and strict change request intake process.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app’s router structure, including protected routes, redirects, and admin-only sections using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsC: Renders admin analytics cards showing user, request, and rating statistics with icons.
frontend/src/components/animation/Floati: Displays animated floating background shapes for visual decoration.
frontend/src/components/animation/Reveal: Reveals wrapped content with a fade-and-slide animation when it enters the viewport.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access-denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Implements a chat interface with message fetching, sending, auto-scrolling, and read receipts for a request.
Wraps the Input component while restricting allowed input types.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the global layout, including navigation, theme toggle, and role-based links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Typing: Creates a looping type-and-delete text animation for hero section messaging.
frontend/src/components/owner/TelegramCo: Manages Telegram bot configuration for admin notifications, showing status and update form.
frontend/src/components/ratings/RatingDi: Modal for submitting a rating with stars and comment, calling useAddRating and resetting state on success.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Filter panel providing search, offline-only toggle, and optional city filter, emitting changes via callbacks.
Displays requests as cards with status, actions, location, and optional chat indicators using unread counts.
Success card showing confirmation of a submitted request with buttons to navigate to dashboard or submit another.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-only hooks for checking admin status and managing users, requests, and analytics via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication helper exposing login, logout, profile state, role checks, and dashboard navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Chat hooks for fetching, sending, and marking messages as read, plus unread count polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for retrieving and saving the authenticated user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Includes utilities to create an AuthClient with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useRatings.ts: Defines React Query hooks to add ratings and fetch ratings for helpers or specific users using the backend actor. Invalidates related rating queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequests.ts: Implements React Query hooks for creating, fetching, filtering, accepting, and completing help requests via the backend actor. Automatically invalidates relevant request queries after mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with theme variables, dark mode styles, utility classes, gradients, glass effects, and animations. Applies global styling for consistent UI appearance.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App. Imports global styling.
frontend/src/pages/CreateAccountPage.tsx: Handles the two-step account creation flow with Internet Identity login and profile setup. Saves profile data, stores extra fields locally, and redirects users to their dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing users, requests, analytics, and tools for deleting users or requests, with authorization and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/HelperDash: Displays helper dashboard with filters, available/assigned requests, and actions to accept, complete, and chat about requests.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/StudentDas: Shows student dashboard with categorized requests, search filtering, chat access, and rating dialog for completed tasks.
frontend/src/pages/FreelancingHelpPage.t: Allows eligible authenticated users to submit freelancing help requests, validating profile status and permissions. Submits requests via backend and displays a success banner after submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights, stats, and navigation buttons for account creation, login, and help requests.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with authentication handling, loading states, and redirect for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page displaying an error message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerConsolePag: Owner admin console providing business stats, request counts, and Telegram config status with navigation shortcuts.
Lists all requests for owners with filtering by status and navigation to view request details.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerRequestDet: Displays full details of a specific request for owners, including status, metadata, and integrated chat panel.
frontend/src/pages/StudentRequestHelpPag: Form page for students or businesses to submit help requests with validation, authentication checks, and success banner.
frontend/src/pages/WorkRequestPage.tsx: Form page allowing eligible users to submit work requests with role-based permissions, validation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/routes/ProtectedRoute.tsx: Guards routes based on authentication, role requirements, and optional admin backend verification.
frontend/src/seo/usePageTitle.ts: Sets the document title for each page using a React effect.
frontend/src/utils/helpRequestErrors.ts: Converts backend help-request error messages into user-friendly text descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/localProfileExtras.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears per-user profile extras in localStorage using a prefixed key.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based params including removal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integration for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s architectural notes, issues, features, and metadata describing current app state and requirements.
